quotes.text: If you pick up a starving dog and make him prosperous he will not bite you. This is the principal difference between a dog and man.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: He who is cruel to animals becomes hard also in his dealings with men. We can judge the heart of a man by his treatment of animals.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.text: Whoever said you can't buy Happiness forgot little puppies.
quotes.author: Gene Hill

quotes.text: There is no psychiatrist in the world like a puppy licking your face.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.text: Dogs never lie about love.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Moussaieff Masson

quotes.text: If you have men who will exclude any of God's creatures from the shelter of compassion and pity, you will have men who will deal likewise with their fellow men.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.text: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.text: Heaven goes by favor. If it went by merit, you would stay out and your dog would go in.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring - it was peace.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.text: The dog is a gentleman; I hope to go to his heaven not man's.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I care not much for a man's religion whose dog and cat are not the better for it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: You think dogs will not be in heaven? I tell you, they will be there long before any of us.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs.
quotes.author: Charles de Gaulle

quotes.text: Happiness is a warm puppy.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.text: Dogs are wise. They crawl away into a quiet corner and lick their wounds and do not rejoin the world until they are whole once more.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.text: Dogs are great. Bad dogs, if you can really call them that, are perhaps the greatest of them all.
quotes.author: John Grogan

quotes.text: Dogs never bite me. Just humans.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: A house is not a home without a dog.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The more boys I meet, the more I love my dog.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood
